website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, versatile eyebrow gel that's best for keeping brows neat and tamed. However, if you need brow color, you'll have to pair it with other brow makeup products.
pros: This clear eyebrow gel is perfect for unruly brows, as it defines them and smooths hairs into place
Can be used with other brow products like powders and pencils that add color
cons: Has a slight scent that doesn't appeal to all users
You may have to reapply it during the day for best results
Not ideal by itself for sparse or pale brows that need color

customer_reviews.title: Great gel
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy and I seen horror story's aboutnl people getting their eyebrows done and it looking really bad so that's not an option this gel is amazing and it seems okay as well. I have wild brows if wind it's them it's scary. This gel keeps my brows in place and I recommend this to anyone guy or girl that wants to manage their eyebrows for guys make sure it is clear and not black or brown those colors look like makeup the clear is natural.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skinned peeps
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a picky makeup user by any means, but I've recently made an attempt to not look like s hot mess by the end of the day. I have very oily skin, so, by the end of the day, most of my makeup has "slithered" off my face. I'm quite impressed by this product. It keeps my brow pencil on and looking as nice as when I first did them.
customer_reviews.author: FeatherpinTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing, and not returnable!
customer_reviews.text: I am over 50, and my aging brows are becoming unruly, growing in all the wrong directions. I read that an eyebrow gel could help, and decided to try this one. It did nothing. I applied it repeatedly (with drying time between applications), but to no avail. It was like brushing on water. Then when I tried to return it on the day it arrived, I found that it is not returnable (I missed the small print on the product page). So, unless you have used it before, and know you like it (some reviewers seem to find it does something for them) don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Westport Reader

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome, easy, versatile and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: After having my eyebrows microbladded, my technician recommended this product to help train my eyebrows to go up. I’d had been using clear mascara but, she said it’s quite different and to try this. Wow! It works amazing. A little goes a LONG way! Keeps my eyebrows in “order and shape”, without even knowing its there. I’ve not been irritated by this product. Easily removes when washing face. I’ve used a dab of this for applying glitter to my daughters face and it works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if anyone has mentioned this, but this product smells fantastic. It is a great light gel and the fragrance makes it all that much better. Definitely my favorite, totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but slightly effective
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd give this eyebrow gel a go.. well it literally just wipes off any makeup I've applied to my eyebrow. So I applied the gel first and eyebrow powder over it and it seemed to do just fine. For the price I guess it's worth a shot but I'll definitely be returning to my higher end brands.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend-Doesn't Come out of Tube
customer_reviews.text: This brow setting gel seems to work once I can get it out of the tube. The gel does not cling to the provided applicator brush at all! I tried shaking the tube and turning it upside down, but nothing helped. I ended up having to use the brush from my empty tube of Benefit brow setting gel to get any of it applied onto my brows. I was looking for an alternative to the $40.00 Benefit product, but unless I got a bad tube, this gel was a total waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R. Crow

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this clear sculpting gel. It tames and sets my eyebrows, making them look just right. I especially love how the brush applicator leaves behind any excess gel when it's pulled out of the tube so it's not goopy or runny. The gel itself feels light and not sticky at all, and the brush size is just right. There's also no annoying fragrance or scent. This is a must-have in my make-up routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, I use it everyday and it works just as well as a high end brow gel. However, as you can imagine, it looks disgusting after using it for a while. If you use it along with a brow tinting product, it will get on the wand of this eyebrow gel, and will make the whole tube look dirty. For that reason, I think the tube shouldn’t be clear. However, this isn’t a big enough issue to keep my from repurchasing the product. It’s a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Goodale

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing
customer_reviews.text: This product does nothing. I'm growing out my brows from a tech over waxing and some of the hairs are growing out a bit wild and I needed to train them by holding them in place. This stuff doesn't hold anything. I doesn't do anything. It's useless. Don't waste your moiney
customer_reviews.author: LV Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Inside brush detached from cap when I opened, rendering basically useless
customer_reviews.text: I will not purchase this again. I opened the package untwisted the cap and it disconnected from the brush. What a waste of money. I did attempt to use it on my brows, but the gel got more on my fingers than my brows. Threw it away and ordered something else.
customer_reviews.author: Neighbor_Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY thick eyebrows so it’s hard to find a gel that’s actually holds them in place. Usually if I do find one that works unfortunately it won’t be gentle enough and make some hairs fall out when I take it off. This doesn’t hold them all day, but I needed a gel I can just carry on my purse for touch ups or days when I’m doing my makeup quickly in the work bathroom after a night out lol. But it is gentle, doesn’t flake, and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: This would be a pretty good eyebrow gel if it were fragrance-free
customer_reviews.text: This would be a pretty good eyebrow gel if it were fragrance-free. It's similar to that of hair gel where you get that crunchy hardened feeling yet it didn't hold well all day. Got a solid 3 hours of hold and then the brows fell back to their natural state. The fragrance irritates my skin and it was overall not the best, but I'm not disappointed given the price point. Would rather spend $20 for Anastasia fragrance-free, no-crunch, all-day hold, no skin irritation. If you don't have a sensitivity to fragrance and don't mind a crunch to the touch feeling, this eyebrow gel will work amazingly for you.
customer_reviews.author: george fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I’m in my 60’s so my brows just go wherever they want. I read reviews and thought I’d try it since it was only $6.00 It doesn’t hold very well, I found I have to use both the urban decay brow tamer as well as this one. Also not very much gel seems to come out on the brush. It probably works better for younger people who’s brows aren’t quite so stubborn I’ll use it just doesn’t work as well as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: R Miyahara

customer_reviews.title: pretty good, strong smell
customer_reviews.text: works well, but has a very strong perfume odor when opened. the smell has gone away over time. gets dirty faster than maybelline...maybe bc the larger bristles pick up more makeup? i'm switching back to maybelline solely bc the bright green top is super easy to find in my makeup bag. this one kinda gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Caitilou

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Pretty average brow gel. I used this on quick makeup days, but if I'm wearing makeup for a long period of time I typically reach for a more long lasting brow gel. The wand doesn't pick up a ton of gel so you have to apply some of it with the top of the wand and brush it through. I think it does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: No stiffness - feels like water. I like E
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was junk. Threw away. No stiffness - feels like water. I like E.L.F. Brand for same price.
customer_reviews.author: Mnass

customer_reviews.title: Gel had the staying power of water. Basically just ...
customer_reviews.text: Gel had the staying power of water. Basically just a brush for your brows. The lack of effectiveness of this product has lead me to semi-permanent brow make-up. I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this brow gel.. it works great for just regular every day use. It pretty much lasts through a workday and reapplication here and there is no big deal. I love that’s it’s not thick and gloopy.. it’s very light weight but still effective. On top of everything else it smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bice

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This brow gel is just OK.. I have thick brows that tend to go every which way through out the day and I’ve tried better brow gels that keep them in place. This doesn’t really have much of a hold and the wand is huge. I would recommend the Glossier brow gel it’s better hold and more precise wand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: There is no scent and it dries clear. It doesn’t dry in a noticeable way like hairspray can do (leaving it hard or clumpy to look at). You also don’t have any white residue or shine on your skin. I have allergic reactions to a lot of soaps, detergents, lotions, make up...pretty much anything you put on your skin. This product I have used for a year now with no reaction!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good sculpting gel for eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Good gel to go over your eyebrows after you sculpt them to hold them in place!
customer_reviews.author: Miya

customer_reviews.title: Like it but is more watery than gel
customer_reviews.text: No scent, which is nice for me personally and does not irritate the skin, for the price I am pleased but it is a bit more watery than expected, I was hoping for more of a gel-like consistency but it still works nice! It also lets a natural look be applied via eyebrow tint. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: did not make my brows lay down
customer_reviews.text: I have very sparse brows and most of my few hairs stand up. I was hoping this would make them lay against the skin. It did not. If your problem is different (just organizing the hairs), it may work for your purposes. I have super sensitive skin and this did not bother it.
customer_reviews.author: vickyann

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for this in stores for months and couldn’t find it. Finally looked here and was so happy to get it. It works perfectly! I prefer my eyebrows to be stuck in their place rather than “free” as my sister calls it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eyebrow gel!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyebrow gel to use and thus far the cheapest I’ve seen. I have unruly thick eyebrows and what I love most about this gel is not only does it dry clear but it’s long lasting. It isn’t waterproof but that’s not a negative for me. Some of the reviews stated that it doesn’t give out a lot of product which is true, but if you remove the plastic piece that drains the excess gel you won’t have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Yas

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: It was a cheap "add on" to my cart. It didn't really hold my brows in place so if you want a clear "mascara" to brush your brows then this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: SUCKS ASS
customer_reviews.text: this product has great reviews and i have no idea how. i have baby fine brow hairs so it doesn’t take much to put them in place. this stuff is the consistency of water. it doesn’t do anything at all, doesn’t work, waste of money, non returnable. very disappointed. this is the worst brow gel i’ve ever used in my entire life. zero stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: C Span

customer_reviews.title: Best Brow Gel
customer_reviews.text: Favorite brow gel on the market. I always get compliments on my brows and I believe this product has a lot to do with making them look more natural after they are drawn in by magnifying each blade a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Noel

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel. It feels refreshing and is the last thing I put on after I get dressed. It lasts and it also works well with the bang flyaways. I'm a repeat buyer of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more crazies
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent brow gel, much better than Maybelline. When I first bought it, it brought everything under control. Lately, my brows have become even more wirey and they don't want to comply any longer. I'll keep using this until I find something better for the old ladies. :)
customer_reviews.author: UntouchableShe

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of the container was cracked when it arrived and had spilled in the box. I still tried to use what was left and it was difficult to even get any product out of the container on the wand. I don’t think it did anything to hold my eyebrows in place. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: May I just say- THIS SMELLS GREAT. It does its job and holds the hairs in place. Not much else to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Keara Rileigh

customer_reviews.title: A great, affordable brow gel.
customer_reviews.text: The gel shipped within three with Prime in unopened packaging. The product works well without making the brows too stiff and crunchy. The bottle is the size of a lip gloss. The gel smells faintly of Johnson’s baby soap. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrstin Teeter

customer_reviews.title: Works well on thick brows
customer_reviews.text: This gel works very well, and make my brows look nice and defined for several hours. I can’t say these would slick your brows into place, but it does have pretty good staying power. Also, strangely, it smells really good, which is not something I’ve ever experienced with a brow product lol
customer_reviews.author: randymac

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: this product tends to take off the brow product you use to color your eyebrows
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great and for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great and for a great price. I wish I had discovered it sooner. I use an eyebrow pencil and/or a little eyeshadow on a smudge brush then go over it with this sculpting gel and it makes my eyebrows look great.
customer_reviews.author: SoleilTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It works for me because I have sparse eyebrows that need to be molded in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrct

customer_reviews.title: Great brows
customer_reviews.text: Love this brow gel. Really keeps my brows shaped nicely. Light and not sticky. It is a must have
customer_reviews.author: genie

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessarily Fragranced
customer_reviews.text: Works well, doesn't dry up and flake. The only problem is that it's scented. I don't want anything on my face to include fragrances. It's unnecessary and irritating to the skin. Will revise my review if I have any noticeable irritation around my eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, work great
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a clear affordable gel brow to tame my unruly brows. This works great and does not flake like I found with other gels and same price point. Will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as I prefer mine to be
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't as heavy duty as I like my brow gel, but in its defense I like my brow gel to basically glue them to my face. For anyone out there in the market, try NYX! This stuff only held my coarse brows in place for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This gel sets my eyebrows for the day, and it is a great product for the money. If I could change one thing, it would be that it had slightly more staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Good for brows. Great for hair wisps.
customer_reviews.text: Great for eye brows and hair wisps. I use this for my daughter's hair whenever it needs to be clean and precise.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This product does keep my 60something brows in place. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does keep my 60something brows in place. Otherwise, they'd be pointing in all directions. It isn't stiff, but natural feeling. I put it on, let it dry, apply my brow pencil, give it a little brush over and I'm done. I will be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Naddie Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good Eye Brow Gel
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually put a lot of make up on my face. This gel is very light and easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Gatita15

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not the best out there but for the money it’s a value and does the job
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT tame eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Worthless to tame unruly eyebrow hair. Chapstick works better and is way cheaper. Seriously, did absolutely nothing. The gel is like hair gel and really thin.
customer_reviews.author: swoem2

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend and will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and does the job. Highly recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Honles

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Might as well just brush some water onto your brows. Makes you feel like you've done something, but after it dries it has zero effect.
customer_reviews.author: Pushie

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for good results but it just didn't work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I haven't tried other brow gels so I really don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried other brow gels so I really don't have anything to compare it to. However, it does work well and I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: skyequeen

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product and good value
customer_reviews.text: This helps keep stray brow hairs in line and helps eye brow pencil stay put for the day. It doesn't irritate sensitive eyes and skin. It is a clear gel and is a good value!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: literally a dupe for anastasia beverly hills brow gel !! amazing i love it !
customer_reviews.author: Steven E. Barron

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS WATER
customer_reviews.text: This is ordinary water in a bottle, applied to my brows and it did nothing, the brush had no effect either, TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Eky Ikpeikpe

customer_reviews.title: Not enough control
customer_reviews.text: I'd not buy again. I'm a guy and wanted to control my eyebrows, and this is not stiff enough to really keep anything in place.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Been using for years!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff for my browns and a natural lash look!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great brush, and I'm particular. Not too sloppy of gel.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: ... I first started using it it wasn't all that great. I guess you have to get use to ...
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using it it wasn't all that great. I guess you have to get use to this brand. I was using another brand before this one. I felt like the brush wasn't giving you enough gel on the brush to sculpt the brows. I guess because I wore it in it sucks up more of the gel because I love it now. I would recommend a new brush for it though.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well! The ends of my eyebrows go in different directions, my left one sticks up and my right lays flat so I bought this to try to even them out. It takes 2-3 coats to really hold the hairs in place but it held up well all day!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does. Not super heavy so it gives it a natural look without it looking like a glue
customer_reviews.author: Christine An

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t see a difference when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Holds brows but can get flakey
customer_reviews.text: No scent, keeps brows in place, does get a bit flakey after awhile
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Good for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Man this changed my appearance game ten fold! Keeps my eyebrows in check which can make a big difference on anyone. And it’s cheap af
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product lasts all day, which is great! The only thing I dislike is the fact that the brush doesn’t hold much product. I’m having to dip the brush back in the product a lot due to the hole taking the majority of the product off. I don’t mind too much though and have continued to purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: seller sucked, product is ok
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is ok. It has a strong scent. Not unpleasant but a little body spray/perfumy. It also doesn't hold things in place all that well, it's got a very soft grip which means that your brows won't necessarily stay put all day, re-application MAY be necessary. The gel is quite watery. The seller of this product was bad (rockGlam or something?). They didn't send it for ages, had to email them first and they they ended up sending me TWO both of which they charged me for. They're cheap though so I wasn't too upset, but crappy customer service.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: ... from running away on normal days but would not recommend during rainy or humid
customer_reviews.text: This actually keeps your eyes brows from running away on normal days but would not recommend during rainy or humid days
customer_reviews.author: Utshav Shrestha

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this Ardell Brow Sculpting Gel. I read a lot of reviews on all different Brow Gels and finally decided to try this brand. As far as I am concerned this is awesome stuff; it works great to keep my eye brow hairs in place and looking great and what is even better is that the price is very reasonable, who can ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L.

customer_reviews.title: I really love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I have sensitive skin and am always nervous to try things out but this did not irritate me at all. It also didn't feel sticky or too thick. The gel holds my eyebrows in place and they have never looked better. Very easy to use(I youtubed it lol) since this was the first time I used eyebrow sculpting gel.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Parmenter

customer_reviews.title: Broke apart immediately
customer_reviews.text: So the product itself is nothing special, it's just a gel in a suitable bottle for its use. The problem was that the lid on the wand broke off immediately when I opened it. It looks like an atomizer now but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product served its purpose; however, every time I used this gel I seemed to break out near my eyebrows. I would not recommend this product for someone with sensitive skin. My sister does not have this problem though so this gel worked great for her.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Moves around other brow products
customer_reviews.text: I would only recommend buying it if you are wearing the gel by itself, not with any other eyebrow product. I always wear eyebrow pencil and this product just moves it around everywhere and I had to re do my eyebrows every time I wore it. It also does not keep my eyebrows in place all day, so you will probably have to reapply it several times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t keep my eyebrows in place and could barely get any out of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, wish I got a little bit more though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a flexible gel, holds your eyebrow hairs ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a flexible gel, holds your eyebrow hairs in place but doesn’t feel stiff there is no flaking. Even makes hairs look a little bit darker.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as a wax
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what this is supposed to do. I had thought it would sculpt/tame your brow hairs. It didn’t do that for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gma

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This is just a waste of money, I wanted something that was going to hold my eyebrows in place and this stuff does not at all. Don’t buy this it’s a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Karen is fabulous:)

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow gel is non-sticky, which is a great thing. Makes my eyebrows look more shaped
customer_reviews.author: Edilia Flores

customer_reviews.title: This product combs my eyebrows well; the only thing ...
customer_reviews.text: This product combs my eyebrows well; the only thing is that the gel has become cloudy from use. I don't know why and I wonder if it's become contaminated and if I should continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Summamum

customer_reviews.title: Its okay.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, I was surprised it works good even though it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. I'd like it to be little more stiffing. Over all not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: cmullis

customer_reviews.title: It's not super thick, but I can definitely tell it's doing ...
customer_reviews.text: It definitely gets the job done! My eyebrows have recently decided to stop laying flat and start standing up in random directions! The Ardell Brow Sculpting Gel keeps my weird brows in their place! It's not super thick, but I can definitely tell it's doing what it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Peck

customer_reviews.title: Great, though it is wet
customer_reviews.text: Really holds your eyebrows in place. Just know that this product is very wet so I recommend being careful and precise with where you powder the rest of your makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Leiva

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like the clear gel, since I prefer the natural look. The gel holds the brows in place for a while. Yet, I believe I have to use too much of it to do its job. Personally, I won’t buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: 🐱🐈🐯🐢🐺🐹🐻🐬

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done and is super easy for you. I don't het why the price went up so much, I bought one in July for $3.97 and now is almost 4 bucks more expensive WTF!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LCM

customer_reviews.title: Basicly a wet brush
customer_reviews.text: Basicly a wet brush. No holding power at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and you can get this product very fast. No more wasted trips to the store!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever! This brow gel is so easy to use and you can’t over use it on your brows which is always a plus!!! Also with it being on amazon (and for me getting it through amazon prime) it made it a lot easier to get this product shipped to my door for free within a couple of days. It saves a lot of gas and trips to the store looking for brow gel!! I HIGHLY recommend it. You will not regret this purchase!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Muffp03

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for setting brows after filling/grooming. Doesn't bother my sensitive skin either.
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend...
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed this is not like clear mascara it doesn't hold my brow hairs in places at all. But it smells really nice .
customer_reviews.author: Serenity Style

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Probably won’t buy again since I think the Anastasia gel actually holds my eyebrows in place. This one just kind of made them wet for a while but offered no actual results
customer_reviews.author: D$

customer_reviews.title: 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: I disliked just about everything. The solution doesn’t come out of the tube easy at all & what does come out is very minimal. Then, once you apply onto eyebrows, it acts like water. My eye brows did not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydn Lee Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Works even better than MAC clear brow gel and a fraction of the cost! Doesn’t clump or flake off and stays clear all day. Will buy again and again over brand name makeup any day
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible! The brush is too big for the slot so when you lift it out it takes all the gel off the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly N

customer_reviews.title: Worst Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wost Brow Gel ever. Doesn't come out if the container!
customer_reviews.author: Dione

customer_reviews.title: Merp
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really do anything. Might as well put saliva on your brows.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!! I have bought this product 3 times to far, great for people who doesnt want to color in eyebrows but want to have them sculpted and to stay in place through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shively

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my unruly brows in place all day
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my unruly brows in place all day. Apply it after you apply the eyebrow pencil.
customer_reviews.author: J and D

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Hardly anything on the brush when I pull it out of the tube
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Two Happy Brows
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It held my brows in place all day. Great product
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellinger-Hunt

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: The product is okay, but not the best that I've tried. It lasts for a little bit and then kind of wares off. (after 1 hour). The gel barely comes out of the tube, which I think had to do with the container.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

product_meta.title: Ardell Brow Sculpting Gel, Clear, 0.25 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1

Ardell Brow Sculpting Gel, Clear, 0.25 Ounce

Well-Looking Brows In An Instant

Create stylish eyebrows with Ardell; Clear Brow Sculpting Gel. It contains tiny microfibers that adhere to skin and hair, creating natural-looking fullness and definition. Simply stroke eyebrow in reverse direction for more volume, tidy up brow strokes with a brush after creating volume as necessary, and your natural-looking eyebrows are now complete!

Free From Harmful Ingredients

Clean and cruelty-free brow products to green your routine. Swap out your current brow products with the Ardell; Clear Brow Sculpting Gel! It does not contain triclosan, synthetic dyes, sulfate and 100% vegan, cruelty-free. This eyebrow gel only use clean ingredients you can trust for a natural-looking, rich color, and healthier eyebrows!

Easy To Apply Brow Gel

The gel formula is extremely lightweight and glides on effortlessly. Application is super easy, just brush the product through your brows and let the results speak for themselves! Prepare and shape your eyebrows and apply brow makeup as usual. For the finishing touch, brush Ardell; Brow Sculpting Gel through the brows to evenly distribute the color and set brows in place. Get gorgeously sculpted and conditioned eyebrows with ease!
feature_bullets: TAME BROWS INTO SHAPE, PROVIDES AN ALL DAY HOLD: Ardell Clear Brow Sculpting Gel works to set brow color and hold brow hairs in place for a clean, polished look! It creates that no-makeup makeup look. With a few swipes, it whipped up those thick, luscious brows I've always dreamed of! Simply stroke eyebrow in reverse direction for more volume, tidy up brow strokes with a brush after creating volume as necessary, and your natural-looking voluminous eyebrows are now complete!

COLORLESS BROW GEL FORMULA: If your brow pencil is already in your ideal shade, let this colorless gel seal in your hard work. This eyebrow gel from Ardell features a clear formula that delivers flexible hold without a stiff feel. Used alone or as a topcoat to your eyebrow makeup, the clear gel dries without leaving residue behind, giving brows a fuller appearance and a polished finish. Get your eyebrows in line for good!

MASCARA WAND, PRECISE AND QUICK APPLICATION: Ardell Clear Brow Sculpting Gel comes with a mascara wand that is easy to apply. With a brush, this small, even those with the sparsest brows can make their arches last all day. The precision makeup brush deposits the ideal amount of product for a controlled application. To use, brush evenly through brows for a perfectly groomed finish!

FAST-DRYING, SMUDGE-FREE BROW GEL: Take control of unruly brows with the fast-drying, sculpting brow gel from Ardell! It won't make your brows crispy nor is the control super-strong. Talk about a luxurious, touchable feeling with a clear amount of gel! The Ardell Clear Brow Sculpting Gel is great at coating and defining each brow hair for a controlled, polished look. It also boasts a smudge-free claim with the fast-drying formula tints and tames, ensuring a flawless finish.

PRO APPROVED BRAND: Ardell, the most widely recognized name in faux lashes and brow artistry by catering not just to legions of beauty professionals and Hollywood makeup artists but also to women looking to enhance their own beauty. Ardell products comfort and affordability make them a luxury that elevates any makeup look to another level. It offers an array of faux lashes, brows design essentials, and color cosmetics to suit every woman, every skin type, every event, and every lifestyle!
